message.body: Hey girl hey! Dins tonight is ladies only right?
It doesnt have to be! Bring dan! :)
Haha I just don't want to bring him if he's going to be the only dude. Is dave going?
He going to meet up there but all send out an email if you want saying to bring other peeps if you want!
Aww thank you but don't worry about it, he'll just meet up with us at sparkle and cheer :-)
Lovers i am going to be late they Just called to tell me they are canceling if were not there by 710 so hopefully someone more responsible than myself w
Wahh! I'm on my way, hopefully ill be there by then! How rude of them.
Soo I'm still on the bus, prob not gonna get there by ten after...hopefully someone else will!
Oh good im not the only one!
